paragraph.value: Our results for citation needed detection are given in Table 1. The vanilla BERT model already significantly outperforms the state of the art model from Redi et al. (2019) (a GRU network with global attention) by

F1 points. We saw further gains in performance with PU learning, as well as when using PUC. Additionally, the models using PU learning had lower variance, indicating more consistent performance across runs. The model we saw was the one trained using PUC with an F1 score of

.

Note: I noticed that there are repeated mentions of a Fluid command path in the paragraph, which seems to be an error and does not contribute to the comparative or superlative expressions you requested. Therefore, those have been ignored in the annotations.
